name: Tex-Mex'' Kasha
keywords: buckwheat groats, chili powder, tomato, main course, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon pure mild chili powder (see note)
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 cup coarsely grated Monterey Jack cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in medium skillet. Add onion, celery, pepper and garlic and saute until onion is soft. Stir in oregano, cumin and chile powder along with kasha and tomatoes. Season to taste with pepper; reduce heat and cover. Cook over low heat for about 20 minutes, until liquid has evaporated and kasha is cooked.
Freeze. To serve, defrost, reheat slowly; sprinkle with cheese; cover and cook minute or two longer until cheese melts.
